content: needles 1 & 3 and established cable pattern on instep needle 2 until you are 1-3/4 2 2 short of your actual foot length the toe beginning of round starts from middle of heel with instep sts on needle 2 needle 1 14 16 18 sts needle 2 28 32 36 sts needle 3 14 16 18 sts round 1 needle 1 knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 2 k1 ssk work to last 3 sts k2tog needle 3 k1 ssk knit to end round 2 needle 1 knit needle 2 knit needle 3 knit repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 28 32 36 sts remain repeat round 1 only until 8 12 12 total sts remain continue knitting across needle 1 so that those sts are now on needle 3 - there will be 4 6 6 sts on each of two needles cut yarn leaving a 12 30cm tail thread onto a tapestry needle and use the kitchener st to graft the sts weave in ends directions for the left sock left sock stitch guide c6b slip 3 sts to cable needle hold in back knit next 3 sts then knit 3 sts from cable needle cuff ribbing co 56 64 72 sts being careful not to twist sts join for working in the round and place marker pm for beginning of round work rnds 1-18 of ribbing pattern as follows round 1 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 2 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 3 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 c6b *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 4 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 5 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 7 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 8 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 c6b *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 9 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 10 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 11 *p2 k2* repeat
